name: Flowergun
description:
Help Evelyn save her friend. Use your trusty Flowergun to defeat your foes. Use seeds to heal Evelyn or powerup the Flowergun.

Controls: use the "A" and "D" keys (or the arrow keys) to move Evelyn, press the space bar to jump, and press "F" to fire the Flowergun. Video game controller/joystick is also supported.

A list of sources (i.e. the origins of all of these wonderful assets) will be provided shortly.
